name: mysql
description: MySQL Server is a widely used open-source relational database management system. It's the backbone for many applications, offering full data control for self-hosted and enterprise database workloads.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Index and search text content efficiently using built-in full-text indexing capabilities

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Divide large tables into smaller pieces for improved query performance and maintenance

features.title: Performance Tuning
features.description: Optimize queries with explain plans, indexes, and query cache for faster data access

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Use mysqldump, binary logs, and point-in-time recovery for comprehensive data protection
